CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 23, 1961, pg. A16, reads: "Bride and Groom - Mr. and Mrs. Ernest Albert May joined the ranks of newly wedded couples, recently, at Calvary Baptist Church. The bride is the former Shirley Griffin Hatcher. - Harris Photo."  Accompany article reads: "Hatcher - Mays Nuptials Held - Shirley Griffin Hatcher and Ernest Albert Mays were united in marriage recently, at the Calvary Baptist Church.  The bride, daughter of Mrs. Roceanis Payne, wore a three quarter length gown of pink nylon swiss, fashioned with a scoop neckline.  The back interest featured a chiffon cape, centered by self-fabric cabbage roses.  Miss Jimmie Earlene Griffin, sister of the bride, was maid of honor.  David Hardy was best man.  The newlyweds will reside in Homewood."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of possibly David Hardy, groom Ernest Albert Mays, bride Shirley Griffin Hatcher Mays wearing dress with satin stripe on skirt and cape, and possibly maid of honor Jimmie Earlene Griffin
